page.title: 02Clubs in Wootton Bassett
page.content: At the{Gerald Buxton Sports Ground}the sports they do are football,cricket, tennis & hockey.In 1983 the club was visited by the star of Chariots of Fire.At{Wootton Bassett Riding Stables they have 34 horses but not many of these are their own.They look after them for other people.Mr.Fred Stanford and a few others started the{Swimming {Club}14 yrs. ago when a pool was built in Wootton Bassett.Mr.Fred Davies & Mr Haydn Pugh started the mini section 9 yrs. after it was first founded. The {Judo Club}was started in 1978 and has 98 members & 2 instructors.You have to be 5 yrs. old to be a junior member & 16 to be a senior member. In Wootton Bassett there are 160 organisations & clubs.Of these a promising new venture has been started by the{Wilts & Berks {Canal Amenity Group}to restore the canal which runs past the town.
